testcase.name: Akademie Edit Environment Register new user checkout clickpath

failure.message: Timed out retrying after 4050ms: `cy.click()` could not be issued because this element is currently animating: `...` You can fix this problem by: - Passing `{force: true}` which disables all error checking - Passing `{waitForAnimations: false}` which disables waiting on animations - Passing `{animationDistanceThreshold: 20}` which decreases the sensitivity https://on.cypress.io/element-is-animating
